projects.title: Shalimar Paints Dashboard
projects.bodyText: Developed a robust internal dashboard for Shalimar Paints using React and Syncfusion components. The dashboard provides streamlined access to various business modules such as sales, inventory, customer management, and performance reports.

projects.title: Approval Management System Dashboard
projects.bodyText: Developed a full-featured approval management system to handle employee lifecycle, user controls, role-based permissions, and designation hierarchies using React and Redux

projects.title: EasyCampus Web Application
projects.bodyText: Developed the main platform for EasyCampus.ai, a centralized solution for managing placement drives involving corporates, campuses, and students

projects.title: EasyCampus Dashboard
projects.bodyText: Designed and developed a student-facing registration portal for onboarding, assessments, and interviewscheduling

projects.title: Global Aspirants Web Application
projects.bodyText: Designed and developed the official website for Global Aspirants, the parent organization of EasyCampus.ai, showcasing their mission, services, and innovative EdTech solutions. The site also serves as a gateway to the EasyCampus recruitment platform.

projects.title: EasyCampus Video Call Interface
projects.bodyText: Designed and developed a responsive video calling interface for EasyCampus.ai â€” an AI-driven campus recruitment platform. The feature allows recruiters and candidates to conduct seamless virtual interviews within the app.
